name: DEAD HORS
description:
You and your horse, Beloved, have taken a great fall while under pursuit. Unfortunately Beloved did not survive and you must brave this strange valley on foot. With nothing to guide you but your senses you step out in search of refuge, and maybe even a stiff drink.

Move - WASD / Arrow keys
Look - Mouse
Interact - E / Space / Left-Click
Pause - Esc
